mapper.insert: insert into asset_user( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", owner, art, region, batch, qty, serial, expire ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{ownerId}, #{artifactId}, #{regionId}, #{batch.jsonStr}::jsonb, #{quantity}, #{serial}, #{expire} );
